spaceship.text: Captain Zara, you're aboard your spaceship approaching the mysterious Planet Zephyr. Your mission is to collect space crystals for Earth's energy needs. The computer beeps with three landing options.

choices.text: Land at the alien space station

crystal_caves.text: You land near glowing crystal caves. The atmosphere here is breathable, but your scanner detects dangerous gas pockets deeper in the caves.

choices.text: Enter the caves with your helmet

safe_cave_entry.text: With your space helmet protecting you from the gas, you safely explore the caves and find beautiful energy crystals glowing on the walls!

choices.text: Use laser tool to carefully extract crystals
Try to take crystals by hand

dangerous_cave_entry.text: The gas makes you dizzy! You quickly retreat back to the entrance. You'll need proper protection to explore safely.

choices.text: Go back to spaceship for helmet

scan_caves.text: Your scanner reveals the caves contain amazing energy crystals, but also shows a hidden passage leading to an underground alien city!

choices.text: Enter caves to find the city

extract_crystals.text: Your laser tool perfectly cuts the crystals without damaging them! You collect enough energy crystals to power Earth for years. But wait - you hear friendly alien voices echoing from deeper in the cave!

choices.text: Follow the voices to meet the aliens

hand_extraction.text: You try to break the crystals by hand, but they're too hard! Some of them crack and lose their energy. You need the right tools for this delicate work.

meet_cave_aliens.text: You meet the Crystal Keepers - friendly underground aliens who protect the energy crystals! They're amazed by your respectful approach and give you a special translator device.

space_station.text: You dock at a gleaming alien space station. Friendly blue aliens greet you with strange musical sounds. They seem curious about your mission.

choices.text: Use translator if you have one

gesture_communication.text: Through creative gestures and drawings, you manage to explain your peaceful mission! The aliens understand and offer to help you find crystals. They give you a special energy scanner.

choices.text: Accept their help and explore together

translator_communication.text: Your translator works perfectly! The aliens are delighted to speak with you. They tell you about secret crystal gardens and offer to share their knowledge of the planet.

show_technology.text: The aliens are fascinated by your laser tool! They show you their own amazing technology - machines that can grow crystals instantly! They offer to trade technologies.

choices.text: Trade your laser tool for crystal grower
Keep your tool and learn about theirs

technology_trade.text: You trade your laser tool for their amazing crystal growing machine! Now you can create energy crystals anywhere in the galaxy!

choices.text: Explore the planet with new alien friends

purple_forest.text: You land in a beautiful purple forest where the trees sing gentle melodies. Strange fruit hangs from the branches, glowing with inner light.

choices.text: Follow the singing deeper into forest

scan_fruit.text: Your energy scanner reveals the fruit contains pure energy essence - even more powerful than crystals! This could be the perfect solution for Earth's energy needs.

taste_fruit.text: The fruit tastes like starlight and makes you feel incredibly energetic! You can feel cosmic energy flowing through you, but you're not sure if it's safe.

deep_forest.text: Following the singing, you discover the forest is actually alive! The trees are ancient, wise beings who have been waiting to meet space travelers like you.

talk_to_trees.text: Using your translator, you have an amazing conversation with the wise tree beings! They offer to share their energy fruit with Earth, but only if you promise to protect nature.

listen_to_trees.text: You listen carefully to their beautiful songs and somehow understand their message of peace and harmony. They sense your good heart and offer you their friendship.

alien_guided_exploration.text: With your alien friends as guides, you discover the most amazing crystal formations in the galaxy! Together you collect enough energy to help both Earth and their planet thrive.

crystal_gardens.text: The aliens take you to secret crystal gardens where energy crystals grow like flowers! It's the most beautiful sight you've ever seen in space.

choices.text: Learn to tend the crystal gardens
Take some crystals back to Earth

alien_technology.text: You learn about incredible alien technologies that use harmony and music to power their civilization. They teach you how to create energy through positive emotions!

test_grower.text: The crystal grower works amazingly! You create beautiful energy crystals that will provide clean, renewable energy for countless worlds.

choices.text: Share this technology with the galaxy

collect_energy_fruit.text: You carefully collect the energy fruit. It contains more power than you ever imagined possible! This discovery will revolutionize energy throughout the galaxy.

choices.text: Return to Earth with the fruit

study_trees.text: You spend time studying the amazing tree beings and learn they're ancient guardians of cosmic energy. They teach you the secrets of living in harmony with nature.

choices.text: Become a student of their wisdom

crystal_success.text: Mission accomplished! You return to Earth with enough energy crystals to power the planet cleanly for decades. You're hailed as a hero and the greatest space explorer ever!

friendship_ending.text: You've made lifelong friends across the galaxy! You establish the first intergalactic friendship treaty and become an ambassador of peace between worlds. Your space adventures are just beginning!

nature_guardian_ending.text: You become the Guardian of Nature across the galaxy! The wise trees share their energy freely with all peaceful worlds, and you spend your life protecting beautiful planets everywhere.

tree_friendship_ending.text: The tree beings adopt you as their space guardian! You learn to communicate through song and music, spreading harmony and peace throughout the cosmos.

garden_keeper_ending.text: You become the Keeper of the Crystal Gardens! You learn to grow the most beautiful energy crystals in the galaxy and teach others how to create sustainable energy sources.

peace_technology_ending.text: You master the alien peace technology and become a teacher of harmony! You travel the galaxy showing civilizations how to create energy through love, friendship, and positive emotions.

technology_sharing_ending.text: You become the Galaxy's Technology Ambassador! You share the crystal growing technology with all peaceful worlds, creating an age of abundance and cooperation throughout space.

fruit_success_ending.text: The energy fruit transforms Earth into a paradise! Clean, unlimited energy powers amazing inventions that help everyone live happily. You're remembered as the explorer who saved the world!

wisdom_student_ending.text: You become a Student of Cosmic Wisdom! The ancient trees teach you the deepest secrets of the universe, and you spend your life exploring the galaxy with wonder and understanding.

solo_exploration.text: You explore Planet Zephyr on your own and discover hidden wonders everywhere! Your independent spirit leads you to amazing discoveries that benefit all of space.

explorer_ending.text: You become the Galaxy's Greatest Explorer! Your detailed maps and discoveries help countless other space travelers find wonder and adventure among the stars.

learn_alien_culture.text: You learn about the amazing Crystal Keeper civilization and become their first human friend! They share ancient knowledge about energy and crystals that helps both your worlds prosper.

negotiate_crystals.text: The Crystal Keepers appreciate your honesty and fair approach! They agree to share their crystals with Earth in exchange for knowledge about human culture and technology.

cultural_ambassador_ending.text: You become the first Cultural Ambassador between humans and Crystal Keepers! You spend your life building bridges of understanding between different civilizations across the galaxy.

trade_agreement_ending.text: You establish the Galaxy's first interspecies trade agreement! Both humans and Crystal Keepers prosper through peaceful cooperation, setting an example for all worlds to follow.
